Then Queen <S%H4436><s%> Esther <S%H635><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> O king, <S%H4428><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> it please <S%H2895><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> let my life <S%H5315><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> me as my petition, <S%H7596><s%> and my people <S%H5971><s%> as my request; <S%H1246><s%>

for we have been sold, <S%H4376><s%> I and my people, <S%H5971><s%> to be destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> to be killed <S%H2026><s%> and to be annihilated. Now if <S%H6><s%> we had only been sold <S%H432><s%> as slaves, <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8198><s%> men and women, <S%H5650><s%> I would have remained <S%H8198><s%> silent, <S%H2790><s%> for the trouble <S%H2790><s%> would not be commensurate <S%H9496><s%> with the annoyance <S%H9586><s%> to the king. <S%H5143><s%> "

Then King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> asked <S%H559><s%> Queen <S%H4436><s%> Esther, <S%H635><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> is he, and where <S%H335><s%> is he, who <S%H834><s%> would presume <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3820><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%>?"

Now when the king <S%H4428><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from the palace <S%H1055><s%> garden <S%H1593><s%> into the place <S%H1004><s%> where <S%H4960><s%> they were drinking <S%H4960><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> Haman <S%H2001><s%> was falling <S%H5307><s%> on the couch <S%H4296><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Esther <S%H635><s%> was. As the word <S%H1697><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out of the king's mouth, <S%H6310><s%> they covered <S%H2645><s%> Haman's face. <S%H6440><s%>

Then Harbonah, <S%H2726><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> who [were] before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold <S%H2009><s%> indeed, <S%H1571><s%> the gallows <S%H6086><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> at Haman <S%H2001><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high, <S%H1364><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Haman made <S%H6213><s%> for Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> who <S%H834><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> on behalf <S%H5921><s%> of the king! <S%H4428><s%>" And the king <S%H4428><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Hang <S%H8518><s%> him on it."

So they hanged <S%H8518><s%> Haman <S%H2001><s%> on the gallows <S%H6086><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had prepared <S%H3559><s%> for Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> and the king's anger <S%H2534><s%> subsided. <S%H7918><s%>
